meanings.definition: The state or quality of being eccentric or strange.
meanings.sent1: Her screwiness made her the most interesting person at the party.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't help but notice the screwiness of his outfit.
meanings.sent3: The screwiness of the situation made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The screwiness of the old clock reminded me of a whimsical cartoon.
meanings.sent5: The screwiness of the professor's theories kept us all intrigued.

meanings.definition: A feeling of confusion or disorientation.
meanings.sent1: The screwiness in my head made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent2: The screwiness of the maze left us all feeling lost.
meanings.sent3: His screwiness with directions always leads us in circles.
meanings.sent4: The screwiness of the map made it impossible to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The screwiness of the dream left me feeling bewildered.

meanings.definition: A sense of disorder or chaos.
meanings.sent1: The screwiness in the room was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The screwiness of the paperwork made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent3: The screwiness of the party decorations added to the fun.
meanings.sent4: The screwiness of the traffic made me late for the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The screwiness of the weather caused delays all day.
